info.title: Project Literal Controller
info.description: This is a controller class. Chooses where to get the literals from. If the account is in the translator group and the translations are active, use the translator engine.

method.name: get
method.description: Get all literals of a given project's scope. If the account is in the translator group and the translator is active, get the translator's values.

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale to get the literals from. If NULL, get the current system locale. It is NULL by default.

method.returndescription: An array of all literals as defined in the literalManager or in the translator class.

method.name: wrap

parameter.name: $translationLock
parameter.description: Defines manually whether a literal is going to be wrapped for translation or not.

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale to get the literals from. If NULL, get the current system locale. It is NULL by default.

method.returndescription: The literal span. With translation attributes in case of translator.
